alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:42PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cuyahoga and north central Summit Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 141 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brooklyn Heights, or near Cleveland, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Parma, Twinsburg, Warrensville Heights, Macedonia, Garfield Heights, Maple Heights, Broadview Heights, Brecksville, Bedford, Seven Hills, Bedford Heights, Independence, Northfield, Walton Hills, Newburgh Heights, Valley View, Brooklyn Heights, Glenwillow and Cuyahoga Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
